page.title: 13KEIGHLEY NEWS (contd)
page.content: People who work in the commercial section are:- Manager Classified Deputy Manager Accounts Display Advertising Sales Representatives (shop orders) The paper is sent to Bradford to be printed. They sell about 21,000 copies per week. We decided to look at this week's paper(28.6.1985). The main stories were - MURDER TRIAL HEARS OF TOWN CENTRE STABBING - a 23-year old left a teenager dying after a vicious fight. MILITANT IN BLAST AT KEIGHLEY NEWS-an attack on the news coverage of Keighley Trades Council has been made by a prominent local Militant Tendency supporter. SWIRE SMITH HEAD TO RETIRE- Mr.Dyke, Headmaster, retires in July to become Methodist lay preacher in Suffolk.
